title: 09/07/2021 - HOUR 1 - Stafford, Carr, Cowboys, Newton
itunes:title: 09/07/2021 - HOUR 1 - Stafford, Carr, Cowboys, Newton
description:
Vegas doesn't think Matt Stafford is much of a factor

People should realize Derek Carr is very underrated

The Cowboys are dealing with too many distractions

Cam Newton did all he could in New England


Guest: Albert Breer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
